amendment.description: Amendment decreases funding for HHS General Departmental Management by $2 million and transfers those funds to the Peer Support Programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 160 printed in House Report 115-297 to decrease funding for HHS General Departmental Management by $2 million and transfer those funds to the Peer Support Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan, Ben Ray amendment (A140) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 205 (Roll no. 505).

action.text: Amendment (A140) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
